In environment R : Type Rzero, Rone : R Rplus, Rmult, Rminus : R -> R -> R Ropp : R -> R k : R x : M22 Radd_0_l : forall x : R, z ⊕ x = x Radd_comm : forall x y : R, x ⊕ y = y ⊕ x Radd_assoc : forall x y z : R, x ⊕ (y ⊕ z) = x ⊕ y ⊕ z Rmul_1_l : forall x : R, o ⊗ x = x Rmul_comm : forall x y : R, x ⊗ y = y ⊗ x Rmul_assoc : forall x y z : R, x ⊗ (y ⊗ z) = x ⊗ y ⊗ z Rdistr_l : forall x y z : R, (x ⊕ y) ⊗ z = x ⊗ z ⊕ y ⊗ z Rsub_def : forall x y : R, Rminus x y = x ⊕ ∸ y Ropp_def : forall x : R, x ⊕ ∸ x = z Unable to unify "k ⊗ (k ⊗ Det22 x)" with "Det22 (M22scal k x)".

original: intros x. destruct x as [[a b] [c d]]. simpl. repeat rewrite Rmul_assoc. rewrite (Rmul_comm k a). rewrite (Rmul_comm k b). rewrite (Rmul_comm k c). rewrite (Rmul_comm k d). repeat rewrite <- Rmul_assoc. rewrite (Rmul_assoc k k a). rewrite (Rplus_assoc (k ⊗ k ⊗ a ⊗ d) _ _). rewrite (Rplus_assoc _ (∸ (k ⊗ k ⊗ b ⊗ c)) _). rewrite <- (Rmul_assoc _ b). rewrite <- (Rmul_assoc _ c). reflexivity.
